description:
Users are allowed/denied to perform some actions
  depending on the role he has
name: Authorization

and a CouponPublish handler class
we set up a CouponPublish subscription
CouponPublish should be able to handle 2 event types
There should be exactly one handler subscribed to the CouponCreatedEvent
There should be exactly one handler subscribed to the CreatedUpdatedEvent
and a CouponPublish handler class
we set up a CouponPublish subscription
we generate a coupon with the id "foo-coupon"
DomainEvents should contain 1 event
we dispatch the DomainEvents for id "foo-coupon"
the marked aggregate list should be empty
and a CouponPublish handler class
we set up a CouponPublish subscription
we generate a coupon with the id "foo-coupon"
DomainEvents should contain 1 event
we generate a coupon with the id "foo-coupon2"
DomainEvents should contain 2 event
we call apply on the coupon "foo-coupon2"
DomainEvents should contain 2 event
The aggregate with index 1 should have 2 events
The aggregate with index 0 should have 1 events
we dispatch the DomainEvents for id "foo-coupon"
DomainEvents should contain 1 event
The aggregate with index 0 should have 2 events
we dispatch the DomainEvents for id "foo-coupon2"
DomainEvents should contain 0 event

elements.name: Get exchange rate on a specific date

steps.name: The against currency is USD
The exchange rate is queried
The value should be 1.1763

the invoice item object should be saved

elements.name: Change Invoice Status for and existing ID

steps.name: There is an Invoice with an existing ID "invoice-id"
I try update the status for the Invoice with ID "invoice-id" to PENDING
The Invoice with ID "invoice-id" is successfully updated to PENDING

elements.name: Change Invoice Status for and existing ID

steps.name: There is an Invoice with an existing ID "invoice-id"
I try update the status for the Invoice with ID "invoice-id" to ACTIVE
The Invoice with ID "invoice-id" is successfully updated to ACTIVE

elements.name: Change Invoice Status for and existing ID

steps.name: There is an Invoice with an existing ID "invoice-id"
I try update the status for the Invoice with ID "invoice-id" to FINAL
The Invoice with ID "invoice-id" is successfully updated to FINAL

elements.name: Change Invoice Status for a non-existing ID

steps.name: There is an Invoice with a non-existing ID "unknown-id"
I try update the status for the Invoice with ID "unknown-id" to ACTIVE
An InvoiceNotFoundError error is returned

elements.name: Create a Credit Note for a valid Invoice ID

steps.name: There is an ACTIVE Invoice with an existing id "invoice-id"
I try to create a Credit Note for the invoice with id "invoice-id"
The original Invoice is marked as final
A new Invoice is generated with a reference to the original Invoice ID "invoice-id"
The new Invoice is marked as final

elements.name: Generate Compensatory Events for an Invoice marked as FINAL

steps.name: There is an Invoice marked as FINAL
I try to generate a compensatory event
It should send an InvoiceCreated Event
No Credit Note is created

elements.name: Generate Compensatory Events for an Invoice marked as FINAL

steps.name: There is an Invoice marked as FINAL
I try to generate a compensatory event
It should send an InvoiceConfirmed Event
No Credit Note is created

elements.name: Generate Compensatory Events for an Invoice marked as FINAL

steps.name: There is an Invoice marked as FINAL
I try to generate a compensatory event
It should send an InvoicePaid Event
No Credit Note is created

elements.name: Generate Compensatory Events for an Invoice marked as DRAFT with acceptance date

steps.name: There is an Invoice marked as DRAFT with acceptance date
I try to generate a compensatory event
It should send an InvoiceCreated Event
No Credit Note is created

elements.name: Generate Compensatory Events for an Invoice marked as DRAFT with NO acceptance date

steps.name: There is an Invoice marked as DRAFT with NO acceptance date
I try to generate a compensatory event
It should not send any event
No Credit Note is created

elements.name: Generate Compensatory Events for an Invoice marked as ACTIVE with acceptance date and issued date

steps.name: There is an Invoice marked as ACTIVE with acceptance date and issued date
I try to generate a compensatory event
It should send an InvoiceCreated Event
No Credit Note is created

elements.name: Generate Compensatory Events for an Invoice marked as ACTIVE with acceptance date and issued date

steps.name: There is an Invoice marked as ACTIVE with acceptance date and issued date
I try to generate a compensatory event
It should send an InvoiceConfirmed Event
No Credit Note is created

elements.name: Generate Compensatory Events for an Invoice marked as PENDING

steps.name: There is an Invoice marked as PENDING
I try to generate a compensatory event
It should send an InvoiceCreated Event
No Credit Note is created

elements.name: Generate Compensatory Events for a Credit Note

steps.name: There is a Credit Note
I try to generate a compensatory event
It should send an InvoiceCreditNoteCreated Event

elements.name: Generate Compensatory Events for a Credit Note

steps.name: There is a Credit Note
I try to generate a compensatory event
It should send an InvoiceFinalized Event

GetInvoiceDetailsUsecase is executed for invoice "foo-invoice"
the details of the invoice will be returned

There is a Journal Domain Entity
I try to create a Journal called "Test Journal" with an articleProcessingCharge equal to 2000
A new Journal called "Test Journal" with an articleProcessingCharge equal to 2000 is created
There is an Article Domain Entity
The Article.create method is called for a given ID "article-id"
A new Article is successfully created with ID "article-id"
There is an Article Domain Entity
I try to mark as published an article with ID "article-id" on "2020-01-01"
The published date for the Article with ID "article-id" is successfully updated to "2020-01-01"

I try to save the events
The events are saved and correctly mapped
There is a Transaction Domain Entity
The Transaction.create method is called
A new DRAFT Transaction is successfully created

The Invoice with id "invoice-id" is successfully added to the Transaction

The Transaction status is changed to ACTIVE

I try to change the Transaction status to FINAL
The Transaction status is changed to FINAL

A journal "foo-journal" with the APC of 100
CreateTransactionUsecase is executed for manuscript "foo-manuscript"
A DRAFT Transaction should be created
A DRAFT Invoice should be created
An Invoice Item should be created
The Invoice Item should have a price attached equal to 100

description: This usecase is executed when the manuscript is rejected
name: Soft Delete Draft Transaction Usecase

steps.name: A journal "foo-journal" with a manuscript "foo-manuscript"
A Invoice with a DRAFT Transaction and a Invoice Item tied to the manuscript "foo-manuscript"
SoftDeleteDraftTransactionUsecase is executed for manuscript "foo-manuscript"
The DRAFT Transaction associated with the manuscript should be soft deleted
The DRAFT Invoice associated with the manuscript should be soft deleted
The Invoice Item associated with the manuscript should be soft deleted

description: This Usecase is executed when the manuscript is accepted
name: Update Transaction On Accept Manuscript Usecase

steps.name: A Journal "foo-journal" with the APC price of 100
A manuscript "foo-manuscript" which passed the review process
UpdateTransactionOnAcceptManuscriptUsecase is executed for manuscript "foo-manuscript"
The Transaction associated with the manuscript should be ACTIVE
The Invoice Item associated with the manuscript should have the price of 100
